# VS Theme Builder - Webpage üíª

[![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/Website-%23121011.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz/)
[![Theme](https://img.shields.io/badge/nachop_theme-%23121011.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz/)
[![Theme-builder](https://img.shields.io/badge/theme_builder-%23121011.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz/)

## ‚úçüèº Description

This is a webpage that i've created to have a better way to showcase [my VSCode theme](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nachop51.nachop-theme) and my [npm package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/vs-theme-builder) to build VSCode themes. Here, you can find some information about both of them, reviews of cool people, and some other important stuff like the [documentation](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz/docs/getting-started/) of the package.

### üé® Theme

The theme is called `nachop-theme`, and it's a theme that *I've created to have a better coding experience*. It has a dark background, with some colors that I've chosen to be easy to read and comfortable to the eyes for long coding sessions.

Better yet , you can use it! Check it out:

[![Install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-%236DB33F.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nachop51.nachop-theme)

### üì¶ Package

The package is called `vs-theme-builder`, and it's a package that *I've created to help people to build their own VSCode themes* without dying in the process. It gives you a better experience to build themes, via simplifying the process of creation and providing a better way to preview the changes.

If you have curiosity, you can check the package and try it out! *(I aprecciate it, and your future you too hehe ü§ûüèº)*.

[![Install](https://img.shields.io/badge/install-%236DB33F.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/vs-theme-builder)
[![Docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/documentation-%23007ACC.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white)](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz/docs/getting-started/)

## üîó URL

You can check the webpage [here](https://vs-theme-builder.nachop.xyz), enjoy„Äú

## üõ† Tech stack

I want to try some new techonologies (for me, like Astro) and also have a good developer experience while building this webpage, while maintaining a good lookin' and performance. So, I've decided to use:

![Astro](https://img.shields.io/badge/astro-%232C2052.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=astro&logoColor=white)
![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/typescript-%23007ACC.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=typescript&logoColor=white)
![TailwindCSS](https://img.shields.io/badge/tailwindcss-%2338B2AC.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=tailwind-css&logoColor=white)

Cool tech stack, yup üòé
